function EP_BAD_04()
  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

SAVE()

  -- //EP3［転-7］の時点で[教養]が１レベル以下の場合、[精神]が１レベル以下の場合、オウガルートへ移行後に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

-- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Three!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Two!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano03.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "One!" ]])

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028aa")
  LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano04.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Boom!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano05.wav")
  MSG([[
  【????】
 "Wheeeeee!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  --LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
  --PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",1000,true)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,-200)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,-200)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano06.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato・Akira】
 "Why though, Bokuhime~!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano07.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Everyone, please gather around!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano08.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Even if you reach a bad end, no worries! It's time for 'Why though, Bokuhime,' where I explain why you got that ending!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano09.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Gather 'round..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano58.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Still low energy... what’s wrong? Let’s try to get motivated once in a while." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano59.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Because if you follow Chapter 2 and put a single point into [Culture], you get a game over. The people who made this game are way too mean." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,true)

  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,30,100,Ease.Linear)
  WAIT(100)
  LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,100,Ease.Linear)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano60.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "I want to read ahead in the scenario soon! Please make the difficulty so I can progress without thinking!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano61.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "Th-That kind of talk is no good! We're characters in this game, so if we criticize the creators—" ]])

  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・雑
  --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI05aa")
  --LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.Liner)

  LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_AKI05aa")
  LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.Liner)
  LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
  LAYER_SCALE(60,200,50)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(60,70,130,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(60,120,80,500,Ease.OutCubic)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(60,100,100,300,Ease.OutCubic)
  WAIT(300)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano62.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Yuru Akira】
 "No waaaay...!? My appearance looks like the sloppy doodles that show up sometimes!?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano63.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "See? They mess with your appearance. I understand it’s frustrating, but we have to praise the creators." ]])

  LAYER_EFFECT(60,6,0,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano64.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Yuru Akira】
 "Mmmm! How tyrannical! I won’t bow to authority... won’t bow to it, Nippon Ichi Softwareeeeee!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano65.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】
 "No, no! If you keep resisting any more—" ]])

  -- //BU：エリカ・メイド（焦り）、アキラ・雑

  LAYER_LOAD(70,"BG000ab")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,false)
  LAYER_EFFECT(70,4)

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI07aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)

  LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(70,0,500,EaseOutSine)
  WAIT(500)
  LAYER_LOAD(70,"")

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano66.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Why is my appearance changinggggggg!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano67.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Yuru Akira】
 "Oh my. Nippon Ichi Software must really like maid outfits, huh." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano68.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Yuru Akira】
 "If this is the first time you’re seeing Mina-chan’s maid outfit, you should practice [Culture]. Also, you should try training [Spirit] at least once." ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  STOP_BGM(1000)
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano69.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Ehh!? The corner looks like it’s going to end before my appearance goes back!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano70.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Please change me back... Nippon Ichi Software-saaan~" ]])

  -- //第３章の冒頭から再開。
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)


  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

-- トレーニングパラメーターのEP3時点の値に戻す
-- ヴィジュアル
SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual = SaveData.EP03_TrainingParam.Visual
-- 教養
SaveData.TrainingParam.Intelligence = SaveData.EP03_TrainingParam.Intelligence
-- 精神
SaveData.TrainingParam.Mental = SaveData.EP03_TrainingParam.Mental

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_04 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""


end
